Description: Here is a nice Omen Extreme 6 just set up with low action and great intonation. Home use only. One ding on the back edge as pictured. 9/10 condition overall. No fret wear. Gig bag included. The Omen and Omen Extreme collections are not to be taken lightly. Featuring mahogany bodies (quilted maple top on the extreme’s), Schecter Diamond Plus pickups, and a fitted contoured heel, these guitars can pack a serious punch while remaining extremely versatile and ready for the stage.
